name: Bachelor of Technology (B.Tech)
description: A four-year undergraduate engineering degree program that focuses on various engineering disciplines such as Computer Science, Electronics, Mechanical, Civil, etc.

name: Bachelor of Technology (B.Tech) - Computer Science
description: A four-year undergraduate program focusing on computer programming, algorithms, data structures, software engineering, and emerging technologies.

name: Bachelor of Technology (B.Tech) - Electronics & Communication
description: A four-year undergraduate program covering electronic devices, communication systems, signal processing, and networking technologies.

name: Bachelor of Technology (B.Tech) - Mechanical Engineering
description: A four-year undergraduate program focusing on machine design, thermodynamics, manufacturing processes, and mechanical systems.

name: Bachelor of Technology (B.Tech) - Civil Engineering
description: A four-year undergraduate program covering structural engineering, construction management, transportation, and environmental systems.

name: Bachelor of Technology (B.Tech) - Electrical Engineering
description: A four-year undergraduate program focusing on electrical systems, power generation, electrical machines, and control systems.

name: Bachelor of Technology (B.Tech) - Information Technology
description: A four-year undergraduate program covering information systems, database management, networking, and IT infrastructure.

name: Bachelor of Technology (B.Tech) - Biotechnology
description: A four-year undergraduate program focusing on biological sciences, genetic engineering, and technological applications in biological systems.

name: Bachelor of Arts (BA)
description: A three-year undergraduate program covering humanities and social sciences disciplines like History, Economics, Political Science, Literature, etc.

name: Bachelor of Arts (BA) - Economics
description: A three-year undergraduate program focusing on micro and macroeconomics, economic theory, and statistical analysis.

name: Bachelor of Arts (BA) - English Literature
description: A three-year undergraduate program covering literary analysis, critical theory, and the study of English language texts.

name: Bachelor of Arts (BA) - History
description: A three-year undergraduate program focusing on historical events, historiography, and cultural and social developments.

name: Bachelor of Arts (BA) - Political Science
description: A three-year undergraduate program covering political theory, governance systems, international relations, and public policy.

name: Bachelor of Arts (BA) - Psychology
description: A three-year undergraduate program focusing on human behavior, cognitive processes, and psychological theories.

name: Bachelor of Arts (BA) - Sociology
description: A three-year undergraduate program focusing on social structures, human relationships, and societal patterns.

name: Bachelor of Commerce (B.Com)
description: A three-year undergraduate program focusing on business, commerce, accounting, finance and economics.

name: Bachelor of Commerce (B.Com) - General
description: A three-year undergraduate program covering accounting principles, business management, economics, and finance.

name: Bachelor of Commerce (B.Com) - Accounting & Finance
description: A three-year specialized undergraduate program focusing on financial accounting, corporate finance, and taxation.

name: Bachelor of Commerce (B.Com) - Banking & Insurance
description: A three-year specialized undergraduate program covering banking operations, insurance principles, and financial markets.

name: Bachelor of Science (B.Sc)
description: A three-year undergraduate program covering scientific disciplines like Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics, Biology, etc.

name: Bachelor of Science (B.Sc) - Physics
description: A three-year undergraduate program focusing on classical and modern physics, quantum mechanics, and mathematical physics.

name: Bachelor of Science (B.Sc) - Chemistry
description: A three-year undergraduate program covering organic, inorganic, and physical chemistry with laboratory components.

name: Bachelor of Science (B.Sc) - Mathematics
description: A three-year undergraduate program focusing on pure and applied mathematics, including calculus, algebra, and statistics.

name: Bachelor of Science (B.Sc) - Computer Science
description: A three-year undergraduate program covering programming, algorithms, database systems, and software development.

name: Bachelor of Science (B.Sc) - Biology
description: A three-year undergraduate program focusing on botany, zoology, microbiology, and biological systems.

name: Master of Technology (M.Tech)
description: A two-year postgraduate engineering program that offers advanced knowledge and specialization in engineering fields.

name: Master of Technology (M.Tech) - Computer Science & Engineering
description: A two-year postgraduate program offering advanced study in computer architecture, machine learning, artificial intelligence, and data science.

name: Master of Technology (M.Tech) - Electronics & Communication
description: A two-year postgraduate program focusing on advanced communication systems, VLSI design, embedded systems, and signal processing.

name: Master of Technology (M.Tech) - Mechanical Engineering
description: A two-year postgraduate program with specialization in thermal engineering, manufacturing technology, or machine design.

name: Master of Technology (M.Tech) - Civil Engineering
description: A two-year postgraduate program offering specialization in structural engineering, geotechnical engineering, or transportation systems.

name: Master of Business Administration (MBA)
description: A two-year postgraduate program focusing on business administration, management principles, and leadership skills.

name: Master of Business Administration (MBA) - Finance
description: A two-year postgraduate program specializing in financial management, investment analysis, and corporate finance.

name: Master of Business Administration (MBA) - Marketing
description: A two-year postgraduate program focusing on marketing strategies, consumer behavior, and brand management.

name: Master of Business Administration (MBA) - Human Resources
description: A two-year postgraduate program specializing in personnel management, organizational behavior, and talent development.

name: Master of Business Administration (MBA) - Operations
description: A two-year postgraduate program focusing on supply chain management, project management, and operational efficiency.

name: Master of Business Administration (MBA) - Information Technology
description: A two-year postgraduate program emphasizing IT management, digital transformation, and technology strategy.

name: Master of Arts (MA)
description: A two-year postgraduate program in humanities and social sciences offering specialized knowledge in subjects like Economics, History, Psychology, etc.

name: Master of Arts (MA) - Economics
description: A two-year postgraduate program offering advanced study in economic theory, econometrics, and policy analysis.

name: Master of Arts (MA) - English
description: A two-year postgraduate program focusing on advanced literary analysis, critical theory, and research methodologies.

name: Master of Arts (MA) - Psychology
description: A two-year postgraduate program with specializations in clinical, organizational, or counseling psychology.

name: Master of Arts (MA) - Political Science
description: A two-year postgraduate program focusing on advanced political theory, international relations, and governance.

name: Master of Science (M.Sc)
description: A two-year postgraduate science program offering advanced scientific education and research in various scientific disciplines.

name: Master of Science (M.Sc) - Physics
description: A two-year postgraduate program offering advanced study in theoretical physics, experimental physics, and astrophysics.

name: Master of Science (M.Sc) - Chemistry
description: A two-year postgraduate program with specializations in organic, inorganic, physical, or analytical chemistry.

name: Master of Science (M.Sc) - Mathematics
description: A two-year postgraduate program focusing on advanced mathematical theories, applications, and research methods.

name: Master of Science (M.Sc) - Biotechnology
description: A two-year postgraduate program offering advanced study in molecular biology, genetic engineering, and biotechnological applications.

name: Bachelor of Medicine, Bachelor of Surgery (MBBS)
description: A five and a half year undergraduate medical program including one year of internship, focusing on medical science and clinical practice.

name: Bachelor of Dental Surgery (BDS)
description: A five-year professional program focusing on dental sciences, oral health, and clinical dental practice.

name: Bachelor of Ayurvedic Medicine and Surgery (BAMS)
description: A five and a half year program focusing on traditional Ayurvedic medicine and therapeutic techniques.

name: Bachelor of Homeopathic Medicine and Surgery (BHMS)
description: A five and a half year program covering homeopathic principles, medicine preparation, and clinical practice.

name: Bachelor of Law (LLB)
description: A three-year undergraduate law program (five years for integrated BA/B.Sc LLB) focusing on legal principles, statutes, and case laws.

name: Bachelor of Law (LLB) - 3-Year
description: A three-year professional law program for graduates focusing on Indian legal system, constitutional law, and various specialized laws.

name: Bachelor of Law (LLB) - 5-Year Integrated
description: A five-year integrated program combining undergraduate education with legal studies for high school graduates.

name: Bachelor of Pharmacy (B.Pharm)
description: A four-year undergraduate program focusing on pharmaceutical sciences, drug development, and pharmacy practice.

name: Bachelor of Architecture (B.Arch)
description: A five-year professional program focusing on architectural design, building technology, and urban planning.

name: Bachelor of Hotel Management (BHM)
description: A four-year professional program focusing on hospitality management, food service, and hotel administration.

name: Bachelor of Education (B.Ed)
description: A two-year professional degree program focusing on teacher training and education theory for becoming a qualified teacher.

name: Bachelor of Physical Education (B.P.Ed)
description: A two-year professional program focusing on physical education instruction, sports coaching, and fitness management.

name: Bachelor of Design (B.Des) - Fashion Design
description: A four-year professional program focusing on garment design, textile development, and fashion industry practices.

name: Bachelor of Design (B.Des) - Interior Design
description: A four-year professional program covering interior space planning, furniture design, and architectural visualization.

name: Bachelor of Computer Applications (BCA)
description: A three-year professional program focusing on computer applications, programming, and software development.

name: Master of Computer Applications (MCA)
description: A two-year postgraduate program offering advanced study in computer applications and software development.

name: Doctor of Philosophy (PhD)
description: A research-based doctoral program typically lasting 3-5 years, focusing on original research contribution in various academic fields.

name: Doctor of Philosophy (PhD) - Engineering
description: A research-based doctoral program in engineering disciplines focusing on original research and technological innovation.

name: Doctor of Philosophy (PhD) - Science
description: A research-based doctoral program in scientific disciplines focusing on original research contribution to scientific knowledge.

name: Doctor of Philosophy (PhD) - Arts & Humanities
description: A research-based doctoral program in arts and humanities focusing on original research in history, literature, philosophy, etc.

name: Doctor of Philosophy (PhD) - Management
description: A research-based doctoral program focusing on original research contribution to business and management disciplines.

name: Doctor of Medicine (MD)
description: A three-year postgraduate medical degree following MBBS, offering specialization in various medical disciplines.

name: Master of Surgery (MS)
description: A three-year postgraduate surgical specialization following MBBS, focusing on surgical procedures and practices.

name: Diploma in Engineering
description: A three-year diploma program offering technical education in engineering disciplines as an alternative to a full engineering degree.

name: Diploma in Engineering - Mechanical
description: A three-year technical diploma program focusing on mechanical engineering principles and workshop practices.

name: Diploma in Engineering - Civil
description: A three-year technical diploma program covering civil engineering drawing, surveying, and construction practices.

name: Diploma in Engineering - Electrical
description: A three-year technical diploma program focusing on electrical circuits, power systems, and electrical equipment.

name: Diploma in Engineering - Computer Science
description: A three-year technical diploma program covering computer programming, hardware, and system maintenance.

name: Diploma in Pharmacy (D.Pharm)
description: A two-year diploma program covering basic pharmaceutical sciences and pharmacy practice.

name: Post Graduate Diploma in Management (PGDM)
description: A two-year postgraduate diploma program equivalent to MBA, focusing on business management and administration.

name: Post Graduate Diploma in Computer Applications (PGDCA)
description: A one-year postgraduate diploma program covering computer applications and software tools.

name: Diploma in Hotel Management
description: A one to two-year diploma program covering food production, front office operations, and hospitality management.
